data_table.description: Sample ID, body site where sample was collected, analyte type, tumor status, histology of samples, and genotyping center associated with participants affected or not affected with familial lung cancer and involved in the "Genetic Epidemiology of Lung Cancer Consortium GWAS of Familial Lung Cancer" project.

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected

variable.name: HISTOLOGICAL_TYPE
variable.description: Cell or tissue type or subtype of sample
